issue.title: [R] Add task for R package with gcc12
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16325](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16325). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We now have a check for gcc11; however, gcc11 has been the default on debian/testing for some time. The CRAN debian image now uses gcc12, so we should update the gcc11 task to use gcc12 here: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/0e03af446c328d0ef963510c3292cb14e092b917/dev/tasks/tasks.yml#L1319-L1328
